name: electron-bundle
description: Electron and its special node modules (ZeroMQ)
readme:
# Electron Prebuilt

This is a mirror repo of Electron distributions and node modules that 
require rebuild against corresponding header files. 

## How to build zeromq.js

 * Be sure you have [Visual C++ Build Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=691126) using the *Default Install* option installed.
 * Add an environment variable `GYP_MSVS_VERSION` is set to `2015`.
 * `export ELECTRON=1.4.5`
 * `npm install zeromq`
 * `npm install electron-prebuilt@${ELECTRON}`
 * `node-gyp.js rebuild --runtime=electron --target=${ELECTRON} --disturl=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --build-from-source`
 * `cp -r build/Release node_modules/zeromq/build`
